attributes.action: Ask BBC director Mark Thomson not to sack Jeremy Clarkson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ipswitch MP Chris Mole has written to BBC director Mark Thompson requesting that Jeremy Clarkson be sacked. We the undersigned assert that that Chris Mole's request is an overseaction to Mr Clarkson's comments on the Top Gear program and request that the Prime Minister ask Mark Thompson to ignore Chris Mole.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
